code.game.models

Class GameData

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • code.game.models.GameData

  • public class GameData
extends java.util.Observable
    Class responsible of updating all the data being manipulated in the game e.g - Player's power - Coins - Balance - Wave no.
    Author:
    Armaghan, Umer, Lokesh
